text: Neuzheli vse lyudi ravny?! Razve tot, kto v Sudnyy den' v otchayanii zashchishchayetsya lish' svoim litsom, poskol'ku svyazany yego ruki, ot zhestochayshego nakazaniya raven tomu, kto pridot spokoyno i mirno v Sudnyy den'? V Den' voskreseniya skazhut nechestivtsam: "Vkusite posledstviya vashikh del
